Comment.Text: For Load/Save - and maybe one day for AI Lodding
Find a despawn job ASAP
Important - if was breaking out, attacking, etc. and then start script - make sure we do not carry on afterwards.
NOTE - there is no motivation here - as it is handled from within the sub tree.
If taken unawares by flamethrower - immediately run away by entering asssault mode
Once we have a killtrap - move up the tree, so that we will not get distracted!
disabled supect target response move to
This is ABOVE stalk and suspicious item low, as this allows scripters to supply default behaviour to replace stalk.
NOTE - this SHOULD be the only branch of breakout.

We want to make sure the alien is not TOO close.....
Hit and Run
Just run away
VENT_BAN_TIMER & VENT_ATTRACT_TIMER are partly managed in code
Banned from vent - we will get the hell out!

This is a back up case: if we end up running at the player anyways, then we will attack attack attack. Should only happen if affected by flamethrower (the thing that gets us out of a vent) has let us down!
This timer gtets started IN CODE when the player enters a vent
When We start up - check that, if the alien is really close, we stop for a secopnd anyway
If we want to withdraw - and the alien is close by and could attack - then do!
Wait until the alien is far enough out, then go backstage
Special branch when the target is an NPC so that it does no extra behaviours except attack
